45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: In Mas'ud said:"The Messenger of Allah ruled that the Diyah for accidental killing is twenty Bint Makhad, twenty Bin Makhad, twenty Bint Labur, twenty Jadh'ah, and twenty Hiqqah

chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Ages Of Camels To Be Given In Diyah For Accidental Killing
